annotation.spannedText: Teens and adults also should also be up to date on their MMR vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: Teens and adults also should also be up to date on their MMR vaccination

annotation.spannedText: MMR vaccine is very safe and effective

classMention.mentionClass: MMR vaccine is very safe and effective

annotation.spannedText: high vaccination coverage helps to limit the size, duration, and spread of mumps outbreaks.

classMention.mentionClass: high vaccination coverage helps to limit the size, duration, and spread of mumps outbreaks.

annotation.spannedText: Mumps outbreaks can still occur in highly vaccinated U.S. communities, particularly in close-contact settings such as schools, colleges, and camps

classMention.mentionClass: Mumps outbreaks can still occur in highly vaccinated U.S. communities, particularly in close-contact settings such as schools, colleges, and camps
